alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:19AM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches except between 5 and 8 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Espanola Valley and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
